com.wangze.chouxiang.ui.send

类 SendFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.wangze.chouxiang.wangze.ImageViewFragment
        • com.wangze.chouxiang.ui.send.SendFragment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class SendFragment
extends ImageViewFragment
    提供上传人脸信息到服务器的功能实现，类似于 GalleryFragment， 主要复用父类 ImageViewFragment的打开相册/打开相机等功能.
    作者:
    王泽, 邵佳鑫
